metadata.title: CVE-2018-16469 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - low
metadata.description:
The merge.recursive function in the merge package <1.2.1 can be trickedinto adding or modifying properties of the Object prototype. Theseproperties will be present on all objects allowing for a denial of serviceattack.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-16469` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjs-merge - 2.1.1+ds-3
node-merge - 2.1.1+ds-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: node-merge package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.1.1+ds-3').
